[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.4.2″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.4.2″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text module_class=”position-wrapper” _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _dynamic_attributes=”link_option_url” background_color=”#f9f9f9″ custom_padding=”20px|30px|20px|30px|true|true” link_option_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjEzNjc5NCJ9fQ==@” border_width_all=”1px” border_color_all=”#efefef” border_width_all_tablet=”” border_width_all_phone=”” border_width_all_last_edited=”on|desktop” global_module=”136317″ saved_tabs=”all” global_colors_info=”{}” border_width_all__hover_enabled=”on|hover” border_color_all__hover_enabled=”on|hover” border_color_all__hover=”#dbdbdb”]

Web Development & IT

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.4.2″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text module_class=”position-wrapper” _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _dynamic_attributes=”link_option_url” background_color=”#f9f9f9″ custom_padding=”20px|30px|20px|30px|true|true” link_option_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjEzNjgyMSJ9fQ==@” border_width_all=”1px” border_color_all=”#efefef” border_width_all_tablet=”” border_width_all_phone=”” border_width_all_last_edited=”on|desktop” global_module=”136317″ saved_tabs=”all” global_colors_info=”{}” border_width_all__hover_enabled=”on|hover” border_color_all__hover_enabled=”on|hover” border_color_all__hover=”#dbdbdb”]

Video Production (Filming & Editing)

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text disabled_on=”off|off|off” module_class=”position-wrapper” _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _dynamic_attributes=”link_option_url” background_color=”#f9f9f9″ custom_padding=”20px|30px|20px|30px|true|true” link_option_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjEzNjg1OCJ9fQ==@” custom_css_main_element=”display:none;” border_width_all=”1px” border_color_all=”#efefef” border_width_all_tablet=”” border_width_all_phone=”” border_width_all_last_edited=”on|desktop” global_module=”136317″ saved_tabs=”all” global_colors_info=”{}” border_width_all__hover_enabled=”on|hover” border_color_all__hover_enabled=”on|hover” border_color_all__hover=”#dbdbdb”]

Business Development

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.4.2″ custom_padding=”20px||20px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.2″ text_font=”||||||||” link_font=”|600|||on|||#cd7e83|” link_text_color=”#cd7e83″ text_orientation=”center” text_text_align=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

No position fits? You can also send us an unsolicited application to career@tintyoga.com

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.4.2″ custom_margin=”0px||||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||100px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.4.2″ custom_margin=”0px||||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.4.2″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.2″ header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”Josefin Sans|||on|||||” header_2_text_align=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Why work at TINT?

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.4.2″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.4.2″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_code _builder_version=”4.4.2″ text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_code][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.2″ header_2_font=”Josefin Sans||||||||” header_2_text_align=”center” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Great culture

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.2″ text_font_size=”15px” header_2_font=”Josefin Sans||||||||” header_2_text_align=”center” text_orientation=”center” max_width=”75%” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”||40px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”||40px||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Humble. Creative. Friendly. Talented. These are the people we hire and this is how our working culture is shaped.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_code _builder_version=”4.4.2″ text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_code][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.2″ header_2_font=”Josefin Sans||||||||” header_2_text_align=”center” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Keep on learning

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.2″ text_font_size=”15px” header_2_font=”Josefin Sans||||||||” header_2_text_align=”center” text_orientation=”center” max_width=”75%” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”||40px||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

With our resource library and a learning & development structure, you’ll have everything you need to help you grow.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.4.2″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_code _builder_version=”4.4.2″ text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_code][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.2″ header_2_font=”Josefin Sans||||||||” header_2_text_align=”center” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Make yourself at home

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.2″ text_font_size=”15px” header_2_font=”Josefin Sans||||||||” header_2_text_align=”center” text_orientation=”center” max_width=”75%” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”||40px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”||40px||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Quiet spaces. Social spaces. Outdoor spaces. Our office is designed for you—we’ll even buy you slippers to walk around in.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_code _builder_version=”4.4.2″ text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_code][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.2″ header_2_font=”Josefin Sans||||||||” header_2_text_align=”center” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Flexible working hours

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.2″ text_font_size=”15px” header_2_font=”Josefin Sans||||||||” header_2_text_align=”center” text_orientation=”center” max_width=”75%” module_alignment=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Some of us are morning people, some of us are night owls. We focus on results, not what time you arrive.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.4.2″ background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” custom_padding=”75px||75px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.4.2″ custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”0px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#e8cc00″ text_font_size=”25px” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||10px” custom_padding=”||0px” text_text_align=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”] [/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”|600|||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” text_font_size=”25px” text_orientation=”center” text_text_align=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Kununu-Score: 4,84

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.2″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” text_font_size=”20px” link_font=”||||on||||” link_text_color=”#ffffff” text_orientation=”center” text_text_align=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

See how past employees rated us: Kununu.com/de/tint1

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

@graph.name: We are hiring - TINT Yoga
@graph.description: Join us on the exciting journey to spread health and happiness around the globe. There is No Try.

@graph.name: TINT Yoga
@graph.description: TINT Yoga offers premium online yoga classes with the world's most popular yoga and movement instructors. Learn and work out with our online yoga videos.
